name: User Analytics Platform
description: A user analytics platform is a software system that allows businesses to collect, analyze, and visualize user behavior data from their websites or applications. It serves as an alternative to tools like Google Analytics or Mixpanel. These platforms offer insights into user engagement, conversion rates, and other key metrics, helping businesses make data-driven decisions. User analytics platforms typically provide features such as real-time data tracking, custom event tracking, funnel analysis, and user segmentation, all while prioritizing user privacy and data ownership.
